meanings.sent1: The prepotent leader guided the team to success.
meanings.sent2: Her prepotent presence commanded attention in the room.
meanings.sent3: The prepotent cat ruled over the other pets in the house.
meanings.sent4: His prepotent intellect overshadowed his peers.
meanings.sent5: The prepotent storm swept through the town, leaving a trail of destruction.

meanings.definition: Dominant or superior in a particular characteristic or trait
meanings.sent1: The prepotent gene determined the color of the flower.
meanings.sent2: The prepotent athlete excelled in every competition.
meanings.sent3: The prepotent chef's signature dish was always a hit.
meanings.sent4: Her prepotent speed on the track amazed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The prepotent lion stood proudly at the top of the hill.
